# Erold - AI-Native Project Management
# https://erold.dev
# Last Updated: 2025-12-13

## TL;DR
Erold is an AI-native project management platform designed specifically for developers and AI coding assistants. It features native MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration, REST API, CLI tool, and a knowledge base that gives AI persistent memory across coding sessions.

## What is Erold?
Erold is project management built for the AI era. Unlike traditional tools (Jira, Linear, Asana), Erold is designed from the ground up to work with AI coding assistants like Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, and GitHub Copilot.

Key differentiators:
- Native MCP server with 27+ tools for AI assistants
- REST API with 68+ endpoints for programmatic access
- CLI tool for terminal-based workflows
- Knowledge base that serves as AI memory across sessions
- Pay-as-you-go pricing starting at $0 (Free) and $5/month (Pro)

## Target Audience
- Software developers using AI coding assistants
- Development teams adopting AI-first workflows
- Freelancers and agencies managing AI-assisted projects
- Anyone who wants AI to manage their tasks directly

## Core Features

### MCP Server Integration
The Model Context Protocol (MCP) server allows AI assistants to:
- Create, update, and complete tasks
- Search and filter project tasks
- Access project knowledge base
- Log time and add comments
- Manage team assignments

Documentation: https://erold.dev/docs/mcp

### REST API
Full-featured REST API for programmatic integration:
- Authentication via Bearer tokens
- Task management endpoints
- Project management endpoints
- Knowledge base CRUD operations
- Rate limited to 1000 requests/minute (Pro)

Documentation: https://erold.dev/docs/api

### CLI Tool
Command-line interface for terminal workflows:
- `erold task create` - Create tasks
- `erold task list` - List tasks
- `erold task done` - Mark tasks complete
- Git integration for branch-based task tracking

Documentation: https://erold.dev/docs/cli

### Knowledge Base
Persistent memory for AI assistants:
- Store project context, coding standards, architecture decisions
- AI can read and write knowledge entries
- Searchable by key or content
- Survives across AI sessions

Documentation: https://erold.dev/docs/app/knowledge

## Pricing

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is Erold?
A: Erold is an AI-native project management platform that lets AI coding assistants (Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf) manage your tasks directly via MCP, API, and CLI.

Q: How does Erold integrate with Claude Code?
A: Erold provides a native MCP server with 27+ tools. Configure it in claude_desktop_config.json, and Claude can create tasks, update progress, and access your project knowledge without copy-paste.

Q: Is Erold free?
A: Yes! The Free tier includes 1 project, unlimited tasks, and 2 team members forever. Pro is $5/month with pay-as-you-go for extra resources.

Q: What AI tools does Erold support?
A: Any tool supporting MCP or REST APIs: Claude Code, Claude Desktop, Cursor, Windsurf, GitHub Copilot, and custom AI agents.

Q: How is Erold different from Jira/Linear/Asana?
A: Erold is built API-first for AI, not humans-first retrofitted with APIs. The MCP server, knowledge base, and CLI are native features, not afterthoughts.
